General.Name: Falcon Machine Tools Co Ltd
General.Description: Falcon Machine Tools Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells grinding, milling, and turning machines worldwide. The company's grinding machines include vertical grinding centers, manual surface grinders, semi-auto precision surface grinding machines, automatic precision surface grinding machines, CNC surface grinders, double column moving beam grinding machines, fixed beam-double column grinding machines, and double-sided fine grinders; and milling machines comprising turret milling machines, vertical machining centers, and 5 axes machining centers. It also offers vertical turning lathes, vertical turning centers, and multi-function flat lathe machines, as well as aluminum wheel production equipment. The company was founded in 1967 and is based in Changhua, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 34, Hsing Long Road, Changhua, Taiwan, 509
